segments.text: They ’ ll do the operation for you this Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it ’ s important to do now . We can have a birthday party for you when you come out of the hospital .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it won ’ t be on my birthday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But your health is more important . Believe me !
segments.speaker: S1
